text: avvāṟē avarkaḷ (misraiyaṭaintu) yūsuḥp muṉṉilaiyil vantu avariṭam; "ajīsē! Eṅkaḷaiyum eṅkaḷ kuṭumpattiluḷḷavarkaḷaiyum peruntuyar paṟṟikkoṇṭatu nāṅkaḷ coṟpamāṉa poruḷaiyē koṇṭuvantirukkiṉṟōm; eṅkaḷukku nirappamākat (tāṉiyam) aḷantu koṭuṅkaḷ; eṅkaḷukku (mēṟkoṇṭu) tāṉamākavum koṭuṅkaḷ. Niccayamāka allāh tāṉam ceypavarkaḷukku naṟkūli vaḻaṅkukiṟēṉ" eṉṟu kūṟiṉārkaḷ
